section.title: Mailing lists
section.para: Communication is handled by Google Groups tools. It offers a regular mailing list as well as archive management.

primary.title: General list
primary.para: The only one list for now, for all discussions about EXPath. You can visit the EXPath Google Groups page or send an email to expath+subscribe@googlegroups.com to subscribe. Post to expath@googlegroups.com.
